title: Obama Calls Clinton Secret Server A “Mistake,” Says Questions "Legitimate" (Republican Party)
text: ( Source : Republican Party ) ​ Click Here To Watch CBS 's STEVE KROFT: ' Did you know about Hillary Clinton 's use of private ... private email server... while she was secretary of state?' PRESIDENT OBAMA : 'No. No.' KROFT: 'Do you think it posed
